ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Worship Allah, have taqwa of Him and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That you should worship God and fear Him, and follow me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that you serve Allah and fear Him, and follow me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Worship God, have fear of Him and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “That you must worship Allah and fear Him, and obey me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That you should worship Allah, and have Taqwa of Him, and obey me,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That you should serve Allah and be careful of (your duty to) Him and obey me:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: saying, "Serve God, and fear Him, and obey you me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Bidding you): Serve Allah and keep your duty unto Him and obey me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that you should worship God [alone] and be conscious of Him. Pay heed to me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Worship Allah, and fear Him, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Worship Allah and be wary of Him, and obey me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That ye should worship Allah, fear Him and obey me:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That you should worship Allah (Alone), be dutiful to Him, and obey me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Worship Allah, fear Him, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Worship God and reverence Him, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:3] [to tell you] that [you should] worship God and fear Him and obey me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Bidding you): Serve Allah) declare Allah's divine Oneness (and keep your duty unto Him) fear Him and repent of disbelief and idolatry (and obey me) and follow my matter, religion and counsel and accept my advice to you,
